content:
The Martin Langsam Family


From : Moishe Miller moishe@langsam.com
To : Steven Altschuler, altschuler@bellsouth.net
Subject : Family Tree of the Jewish People: Martin LANGSAM
=======================================================
Hi,
Saw your posting and was wondering if you are interested in oursuing a
possible connection between our trees. I have a website at:
www.langsam.com

Please let me know.
Thanks!
-Moishe
=======================================================
Email posted from Family Tree of the Jewish People

_________________________________________________________________________
From: 
To: "Steve Altschuler" 
Sent: Saturday, December 09, 2000 4:46 PM
Subject: Re: Family Tree of the Jewish People: Martin LANGSAM



 Hi,
 At this time I have no such knowledge of the Altschuler family. However, I
 was hoping you could tell me something about the Martin LANGSAM in your
 tree.
 -Moishe Miller
 moishe@langsam.com

_________________________________________________________________________
To: 
Subject: Re: Family Tree of the Jewish People: Martin LANGSAM 

Martin Langsam seems to have married into the Dolnick-COGAN branch of our
family which branched out at the turn of the century (the older one).  b
1926.  m Carol Weissberg.  3 children.

good luck.

Steve
_________________________________________________________________________


I would be very interested to hear from anyone with knowledge or an interest in the Miller family.

Moishe Miller
moishe@langsam.com

My home address is
           1374 East 28th Street
           Brooklyn NY 11210-5311
           USA

Last updated 6/22/04
